en: to be mistaken, to go astray
to flounder, to be tossed about
to meow, to miaow; to whine
to do masonry, to lay bricks
to draw up, to formalize; to complete/fill out (documents)
to indicate, to specify, to point out
to run (a distance); to run off/down (somewhere)
to rise, to take off (of a plane)
to make, to render, to do
to have a meal, to eat enough
to pass (time), to go by; to take (time)
to cross, to pass, to switch (to)
to have a look, to look at
to serve (food); to hand; to teach (a course)
to go for a walk, to stroll
to research, to study, to explore
to get up, to stand up
to arrive (time/train), to approach; to be due
to accept; to assume; to adopt; to receive
to sign up, to register (possibly variant of 'pieteikties')
to apply (for), to sign up; (IT) to log in
ru: подать заявку, записаться; (IT) войти в систему

en: to fulfill, to carry out; to fill
to know how (to), to be able
